title: Green spots on the screen corner and Failed to update to Android 10
content:
About a month ago, I started to notice a shadow at the top right corner on the screen of my Pixel 3. It sacred me a little when I rebooted the phone and saw the crescent-shaped green spot. Don't know if it will spread and get worse.

Another problem with this phone is failing to update to Android 10. After the release of Android 10, I tried to update to it for twice. Too bad, both time it got stuck at the Google screen. This screen would last for hours before I forced it to reboot, then it went back to Android 9.

When the Google screen was on during the update process, that annoying green spot looks too obvious...
